description:
First of all I must say that I'm a great optimist! I try to share my positive mood with all people. I have a great sense of humor! I'm cheerful, kind, sincere and loyal person and I appreciate family very much! 

I am honest, romantic, trust, loyal, modern, friendly. I appreciate the family and want to enjoy life to the fullest. I have wide interests and tastes and I get along well with anybody.

I am different and bright.. I am open in my heart and mind! I am active, 
lively, caring. I pace through life reaching my goals, trying to develop, improve and understand myself, people and the whole world.

My heart is still able and willing for passionate, unconditional and true love. I am eager to give to my special one all I have in me - tenderness, joy and affection. I believe in my faith.

If you think we may have some things in common and would like to explore the future and make it the present please drop a line.
